class Solution:
    def minimumCost(self, m: int, n: int, nums1: List[int], nums2: List[int]) -> int:
        tot1 = sum(nums1)
        tot2 = sum(nums2)
        nums1 = [-x for x in nums1]
        nums2 = [-x for x in nums2]
        heapify(nums1)
        heapify(nums2)
        
        ans = tot1 + tot2
        while len(nums1) and len(nums2):
            if nums1[0] < nums2[0]:
                x = heappop(nums1)
                ans += tot2
                tot1 += x
            else:
                x = heappop(nums2)
                ans += tot1
                tot2 += x
        return ans
